contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Broadcast | call_letters = XHBR| station_logo = [[File:Canal de las Estrellas logo.png|100px]]| station_branding = Canal de las Estrellas| station_slogan = "Nuestro canal"<br>(Our channel)| analog = 11 ([[VHF]])| digital = 25 ([[UHF]])| subchannels = | affiliations = [[Canal de las Estrellas]]| founded = October 1968| location = [[Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas]]| callsign_meaning = | owner = [[Televisa]]| effective_radiated_power = [[Analog television|Analog]]: 325 kW<br>[[Digital television|Digital]]: 200 kW| homepage = [http://www.televisa.com/canal-de-las-estrellas/ Canal de las Estrellas]| }} '''XHBR-TV''' is the [[television call sign]] for the [[Televisa]] [[television station]] channel 11 in [[Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas]], [[Mexico]]. The station is an affiliate of the [[Canal de las Estrellas]] network. It also broadcasts local programming and news. XHBR also broadcasts Canal de las Estrellas in [[High-definition television|High Definition]] programming on digital channel 25.1 ([[virtual channel]] 11.1). The station was among the first in Mexico to broadcast in digital signal.<ref>[http://www.cofetel.gob.mx/es/Cofetel_2008/Cofe_infraestructura Comision Federal de Comunicaciones: Telecommunication Infrastructure in Mexico] {{es}}</ref> ==Digital Services== XHBR broadcasts in [[HDTV]] on channel 11.1. {| class="wikitable" ! Virtual<br>Channel ! Physical<br>RF Channel ! [[Video resolution|Video]] ! [[Aspect ratio|Aspect]] ! Programming |- | 11.1 || 25.1 || [[1080i]] || [[16:9]] || [[Canal de las Estrellas]] |} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.televisa.com/canal-de-las-estrellas/ Canal de las Estrellas] {{es}} {{Laredo TV}} {{Nuevo Laredo}} {{Borderland Televisa O-O stations}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xhbr-Tv}} [[Category:Canal de las Estrellas affiliates]] [[Category:Channel 11 TV stations in Mexico]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 1968]] [[Category:Television stations in Laredo, Texas]] [[Category:Television stations in Nuevo Laredo]] [[Category:Spanish-language television stations in Mexico]] {{Mexico-tv-station-stub}}
